Summary: white lights then orange circles much like the one mentioned on Galvan Rd
divs: Sighting DetailsSeen white lights then orange balls that would glow then fade away. I think they are some kind of military flares. Lots of Air Traffic in area that we usually dont have flying. Sounds just like what the man from Texas seen from his rig on Galvan Road. This same thing was reported seen on Jan. 30 by two people article in local newspaper. email tlt@centex.net
